challenges.title: Add Two Numbers
challenges.content: Complete the function body below. The function should receive two numbers as input arguments and return the result of adding these numbers together.

challenges.title: Reverse a String
challenges.content: Complete the function body below. The function will receive an array as input and should return the number of items in the array.

challenges.title: Return the Length of an Array
challenges.content: Complete the function body below. The function should will receive a string and should return the same string in reverse order.
